Food is excellent but you more than likely will need a reservation and it seems when you do, it can get boggled easily. Make sure you give them exact info and show up at least five minutes early or you might lose your table.

It was the saddest avo-toast in my life. Bad bread, taste very stale. The avocado part— as you can see from the picture. You barely get good amount of avocado like other restaurants. Very disappointed for such a high end hotel

Service was great, food was okay.
We like their staffs as they were so accommodating and courteous. The service was so quick, and we thanked them for that. Kudos to them. Strongly advised!

Great service and breakfast was yummy..
Food  was delicious as always. Service was friendly and offered at a safe distance. Restaurant was clean and it was obvious they are observing all cleaning protocols.
Super delicious. The staff was very friendly and attentive. It has a cool atmosphere.

I got the biscuits and gravy with two scrambled eggs (I had them add cheese to the eggs and they did not skimp!)  It was a hearty portion and I was stuffed!  The gravy was nice and thick with plenty of sausage bits.  Yum!

Very neat and welcoming spot. They offer big meals and for fair rates. I liked the meals a lot and the staff were super amiable and chatty. Recommended.

Google should not label Essensia a "Vegan Restaurant." The prix-fixe tasting menu contains some vegan options, but the regular Breakfast, Lunch, and Dinner menus do not have a single vegan thing. Hardly any even vegetarian. A vegan would starve here.

Lovely restaurant with excellent service and tremendously tasty food!
i came here for the breakfast buffet, really worth it and the staff is very friendly and professional

Watermelon and feta salad; ceviche with tropical fruit and plantain chips; fruit plate; burrata Margherita flatbread; fish tacos with avocado mash and pico de gallo; challah French toast; BLTA Benedict; coconut panna cotta; Florida mango tart; flourless chocolate cake.

I went to dinner here. Slow service,  expected better and faster service for the price.  The food was good, a bit on the pricy side. I had the steak, and whiskey sour.  The steak was good, and the drink was made correctly (if you're a whiskey sour person you know what I mean). Overall not bad, but certainly too expensive.

Was here years ago and this restaurant is still as good as ever. Great terrace dining. Food is excellent. Service is very good. Wish I had more time in Miami, I would visit again.

This is a fine upscale restaurant at the heart of Miami Beach. Food was great, but prices are a little spicy, but this is Miami Beach! Great place for a dinner and a walk by the beach after, if you are are not concerned about your budget.

The best restaurant that I have ever been to. Lovely ambiance, amazing atmosphere, food, lighting, staff everything. A must if you are in the area and even if not staying at the hotel. We had a great time, dont miss!

We went there for brunch during Miami Spice, and the food was delicious. Everything was really tasty, with good proportions. Also the brunch could satisfy everyone as they have a wide selection of sweat or salty dishes.

Good food in a beautiful setting. The service was great. We stopped by again to try a few of their cocktails the following day. The bartender, Andrea, was very knowledgeable and helpful in pointing out places to visit on our vacation
